message: Hello Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs. This exceptional item is valued at $15000 by us, reflecting its quality, functionality, and the expertise behind it. We believe it could be an invaluable asset to you. Would you like to explore this opportunity further?

I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12000. I believe it's a great product, but I need to make sure it fits within my budget. Can we meet in the middle at $13500?
